titles.title: Cape Cod National Seashore Advisory Commission Reauthorization Act
Cape Cod National Seashore Advisory Commission Reauthorization Act
A bill to extend the authority for the Cape Cod National Seashore Advisory Commission.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 110-599.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Bingaman with an amendment and an amendment to the title. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1003.

bill.summary: 9/16/2008--Reported to Senate amended. Cape Cod National Seashore Advisory Commission Reauthorization Act - Extends the authority for: (1) the Cape Cod National Seashore Advisory Commission until September 26, 2018; (2) the National Park System Advisory Board until January 1, 2010; and (3) the National Park Service Concessions Management Advisory Board until December 31, 2009.
